name: matrix defense
description:
Tower Defense Game - Matrix Defense
(submission for the AppGameKit competition)

- classic tower defense
- playfield is a matrix surrounded by an energy cache
- the matrix can get instable by impulses due to explosions, enemy movements and global impact
- shock waves in the matrix damage the towers and enemies and trigger the energy cache or vulcano
- force fields called gravitons can be used to reduce wave impulse damage
- continue the game to play again with stronger and faster enmies for more credits
